name: Space Coliseum (programmerNacho, LoboIberico)
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
Theme: Stronger Together

This game was created by:

Gustavo Adolfo "Lobo" Peñas Solano
Ignacio "Blugart" Muñoz Márquez
Alejandro Moralo Vega

External Assets:

Royalty Free Music from Bensound - Slow Motion
Sound Effects - https://www.kenney.nl/


Objective

Build your ship and defeat all the gladiators fighting in the galactic arena!

Controls

Movement - WASD
Rotation - Q and E, or Right-Click and Aim with Mouse
Buy - Use the Numbers from 1 to 8. The Block will be created on the mouse position. Earn Money by winning combats.
Decouple - Left-Click on top of a Block to decouple it. Left-Click on to of the CoreBlock to decouple it.
